details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-1:2014 - 7.11 Embedded files - F and UF keys
details.description: The file specification dictionary for an embedded file shall contain the non-empty F and UF keys

rule.description: The file specification dictionary for an embedded file shall contain the non-empty F and UF keys
rule.test: containsEF == false || (F != null && F != '' && UF != null && UF != '')

error.message: The file specification dictionary for an embedded file does not contain either F or UF key or at least one of the keys is empty (F = %1, UF = %2)
